title: IT: Welcome to Derry
overview: In 1962, a couple with their son move to Derry, Maine just as a young boy disappears. With their arrival, terrible things begin to happen in the town.

title: Pluribus
overview: The most miserable person on Earth must save the world from happiness.
reason: This Apple TV sci-fi drama boasts exceptional critical reception with an 87 Metacritic score and an 8.6 IMDb rating from over 26K votes, helmed by visionary creator Vince Gilligan.

title: The Last Frontier
overview: When a prison transport plane crashes in the remote Alaskan wilderness—freeing dozens of violent inmates—the region's lone marshal must protect the town he's vowed to keep safe.

title: The Beast in Me
overview: A famous author is pulled into a twisted mind game with her rich, powerful new neighbor — who might be a murderer.
reason: This Netflix mystery drama is bolstered by acclaimed leads Claire Danes and Matthew Rhys, achieving a strong 7.5 IMDb rating from over 21K votes and a 71 Metacritic score.

title: The Terminal List: Dark Wolf
overview: Before The Terminal List, Navy SEAL Ben Edwards finds himself entangled in the black operations side of the CIA. The deeper Ben goes into the 'gray', the harder it will become to not give himself over to his darker impulses. Every man has two wolves inside him – light and dark – fighting for control. Which wolf will Ben Edwards feed?
reason: As a highly anticipated prequel to a popular Prime Video series, it features fan-favorite Taylor Kitsch and maintains a solid 7.6 IMDb rating from over 20K votes.

title: Task
overview: In the working-class suburbs of Philadelphia, an FBI agent heads a task force assembled to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspecting family man.
reason: Critically acclaimed with an 8.0 IMDb rating from over 45K votes, this HBO drama features A-list actor Mark Ruffalo and comes from the creator of the hit series Mare of Easttown.

title: Boots
overview: After impulsively joining the U.S. Marine Corps, a bullied teen finds new purpose — and unexpected brotherhood — with his motley team of fellow recruits.

title: Black Rabbit
overview: A rising-star restaurateur is forced into New York's criminal underworld when his chaotic brother returns to town with loan sharks on his trail.
reason: A Netflix crime drama attracting significant attention with over 35K IMDb votes, it stars popular actors Jason Bateman and Jude Law, who also serve as executive producers.

title: Wayward
overview: A small-town cop suspects that the local school for troubled teens — and its dangerously charismatic founder — may not be all it seems.
